message:
Support new LSF UI (#5)

* Updated LSF UI

* UI tuning and settings

* Editor height

* Fix Reviewers column

* Instruments

* Fixing instruments

* Allow empty instruments

* Instruments preparation

* Remove update

* Move instruments to SDK

* LSF panels support

* Reduce amount of network interactions

* Properly initialize LSF

* Make everything work

* Fix label stream not updating tasks on submit

* Remove unnecessary async mode change

* Support custom spinner

* Allow setting loading state externally

* Pass size to a custom spinner component

* Custom spinner size

* Support infobox interface

* Hide add and view all buttons in Label Stream

* Update LSF color

* Fix annotation submit issues

* Format floating point number to precision 3

* Fix tooltips

* Enable infobar for all modes

* Fix issue when filter operator remained unchanged after changing a field

* Expose user cell click event

* Add userCellCounterClick event

* Include task in the event

* Label Button and selectedCount

* Fix label button width

* Fix user access for annotators

* Add TS to SDK; fix params/types issues

id->pk issue, creation date

* Check and show relevant message about API failure

* Add annotation drafts to SDK

* Review states

* Fix userpic border radius

* Fix userpic faded state

* Fix LSF width - fit to screen even in View All

* Fallback for old annotators format

* Fix annotators column

* Fix annotators disappear after labels stream finish

* Fix draft deletion; also don't reload task then

* Allow passing custom actions on init

* Fixes after merge; flow fixes; delete drafts fix

* Don't show predictions in Label Stream

* Support reviweres fading

* Fix label stream: load drafts first

* Fix reviewers column

* Add `reviewed` flag

* Fix predictions creation based on projects settings

* Disable flag

* Get flag back and check it only in Label Stream

* Number filter fixes

* Fix number parser

* Fix issue when filter input was interrupted on the first keypress

* Drop filters if column type changed

Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
